com.yantra.yfs.japi.util

Interface YFSClientIPReader


  • public interface YFSClientIPReader
    This interface needs to be implemented only if a custom mechanism is required to read the cleint IP address from the HTTP request. If custom implementation is required, set yfs.clientip.reader property to the name of Java class which implements this interface. This property is defined in yfs.properties file. The String returned by this method readClientIP is taken as the client IP address. If no custom implementation class is provided, then a default mechanism is used to read the client IP address. *
    *

    Example:
    * 
     
 
 * 
 *   import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest; 
 *   import com.yantra.yfs.japi.util.YFSClientIPReader; 
 * 
 *   public class MyClientIPReaderImpl implements YFSClientIPReader { 
 * 
 *       public String readClientIP(HttpServletRequest request) { 
 *           // Use the http request object to read the client IP address 
             // return the String IP address 
 *       } 
 * 
 *   } 
 *
    *

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String readClientIP(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method is invoked by the application to get the client IP address from the HTTP request object.

    • Method Detail

      • readClientIP

        java.lang.String readClientIP(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method is invoked by the application to get the client IP address from the HTTP request object. request HTTPServletRequest object which contains the client IP information. String IP address of the client
